title: Remove My Fucking Low Priority que bullshit
body: What the fuck is this SHIT? i barely afk/leave my games and this once i do it i fucking get this shit? remove this shit , its fucking stupid....

replies.body:
Swearing and cursing won't really get people wanting to help you.

(Is it possible that you've been reported for offensive language and you've been in low priority for that?)

yeah I'm sitting on a 20 min ban fml 
riot i would rather get ban than this sh*t
